body_html:
Flakiness in spectral ops test:

FAIL: //tensorflow/contrib/signal:spectral_ops_test (see /private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/testlogs/tensorflow/contrib/signal/spectral_ops_test/test.log).
INFO: From Testing //tensorflow/contrib/signal:spectral_ops_test:
==================== Test output for //tensorflow/contrib/signal:spectral_ops_test:
2017-07-20 21:05:37.224871: W tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:45] The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to use SSE4.2 instructions, but these are available on your machine and could speed up CPU computations.
2017-07-20 21:05:37.224894: W tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:45] The TensorFlow library wasn't compiled to use AVX instructions, but these are available on your machine and could speed up CPU computations.
.F....
======================================================================
FAIL: test_gradients_numerical (__main__.SpectralOpsTest)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/private/var/tmp/_bazel_jenkins/13e370a18c169b19baeafefb05212b85/execroot/tensorflow-pull-requests-mac/bazel-out/darwin_x86_64-opt/bin/tensorflow/contrib/signal/spectral_ops_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/signal/python/kernel_tests/spectral_ops_test.py", line 245, in test_gradients_numerical
    self.assertLess(stft_error, stft_bound)
AssertionError: 0.00093367695808410645 not less than 0.0008

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 6 tests in 46.787s

FAILED (failures=1)**

@rryan
